74  class RinexMetHeader : public RinexMetBase
75  {
76 
77  public:
78 
80  enum RinexMetType
81  {
82  PR,
83  TD,
84  HR,
85  ZW,
86  ZD,
87  ZT,
88  WD,
89  WS,
90  RI,
91  HI
92  };
93 
95  RinexMetHeader() : valid(0), version(2.1) {}
96 
98  virtual ~RinexMetHeader() {}
99 
100  // The next four lines is our common interface
102  virtual bool isHeader(void) const {return true;}
103 
105  virtual void dump(std::ostream& s) const;
106 
108  static RinexMetType convertObsType(const std::string& oneObs)
109  throw(FFStreamError);
110 
112  static std::string convertObsType(const RinexMetType& oneObs)
113  throw(FFStreamError);
114 
116  unsigned long valid;
117 
119  enum validBits
120  {
121  validVersion = 0x01,
122  validRunBy = 0x02,
123  validComment = 0x04,
124  validMarkerName = 0x08,
125  validMarkerNumber = 0x010,
126  validObsType = 0x020,
127  validSensorType = 0x040,
128  validSensorPos = 0x080,
129 
130  validEoH = 0x080000000,
131 
134  allValid20 = 0x0800000EB,
137  allValid21 = 0x0800000EB,
140  allValid211 = 0x0800000EB
141  };
142 
143  static inline std::string bitsAsString(validBits b)
144  {
145  switch (b)
146  {
147  case validVersion:
148  return stringVersion;
149  case validRunBy:
150  return stringRunBy;
151  case validComment:
152  return stringComment;
153  case validMarkerName:
154  return stringMarkerName;
155  case validMarkerNumber:
156  return stringMarkerNumber;
157  case validObsType:
158  return stringObsType;
159  case validSensorType:
160  return stringSensorType;
161  case validSensorPos:
162  return stringSensorPos;
163  case validEoH:
164  return stringEoH;
165  default: break; //NB Determine if additional enumeration values need to be handled
166  }
167 
168  return "*UNKNOWN/INVALID BITS*";
169  }
170 
171  /* @return a string composed the RINEX header strings
172  * represented by the validBits set in vb, surrounded by the
173  * quote character, separated by sep.
174  * @param vb bit field with valid bits set
175  * @param quote quote character to use around RINEX header strings.
176  * @param sep separator used between rinex header strings.
177  */
178  static std::string bitString(unsigned long vb, char quote='\"',
179  std::string sep=", ");
180 
181 
185 
186  double version;
187 
188  std::string fileType;
189  std::string fileProgram;
190  std::string fileAgency;
191  std::string date;
192  std::vector<std::string> commentList;
193  std::string markerName;
194  std::string markerNumber;
195 
202  std::vector<RinexMetType> obsTypeList;
203  std::vector<sensorType> sensorTypeList;
204  std::vector<sensorPosType> sensorPosList;

244  }; // class RinexMetHeader
